name: mind-matrix
description: Sync your notes with a postgres vector database and integrate it with your personal AI assistant.

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.prompt: echo '### Prompts.md ###' > combined_code_state.txt && cat Prompts.md >> combined_code_state.txt && echo '### main.ts ###' >> combined_code_state.txt && cat main.ts >> combined_code_state.txt && find models/ services/ settings/ utils/ constants/ -type f -exec echo '### {} ###' \; -exec cat {} \; >> combined_code_state.txt

author: khwerhahn
